2025-09-03.note: Major confluence date - ALL five assets have turning points. Gold and Oil have ~70-76% downward probability. Highest activity day of the month.

2025-09-05.note: Oil turning point with 67% upward probability.

2025-09-09.note: Triple confluence date. S&P and EUR/USD turning points. Gold has 76% downward probability. EUR/USD aligns with weekly cycle ending.

2025-09-10.note: S&P 500 statistically strong up day (76% probability).

2025-09-11.note: S&P 500 71% up probability. Gold turning point date.

2025-09-12.note: S&P 500 76% up probability. Gold 71% down probability but also 70% probability of rising from Sep 12 to Sep 18.

2025-09-15.note: Triple confluence. S&P daily turning point overlaps seasonal peak (strong reversal signal). EUR/USD aligns with weekly cycle. Oil: 70% probability of closing lower on Sep 20 vs Sep 15.

2025-09-17.note: Oil strong turning point zone begins (17-18). Expect important reversal.

2025-09-18.note: Gold turning point. Oil strong turning point zone ends (17-18). Bitcoin 86% probability of lower price by Sep 24 vs Sep 18.

2025-09-23.note: Major confluence date. S&P 76% down probability. Bitcoin cluster zone. EUR/USD 69% down probability. High-risk reversal day.

2025-09-24.note: Quad confluence date. S&P turning point cluster (24-25). EUR/USD cluster ends. Gold turning point. Oil turning point. Major activity expected.

2025-09-25.note: S&P turning point cluster ends. EUR/USD 80% downward probability (strongest single-day statistical signal in entire report).

2025-09-29.note: EUR/USD final turning point of the month.

themes: September 2025 is historically the weakest month for equities (S&P 500) and carries bearish seasonal bias for most risk assets
Major cross-asset confluence dates are Sep 3 (all 5 assets), Sep 9, Sep 15, Sep 23, and Sep 24 - these dates carry the highest probability of significant market moves
The 45-year, 60-year, and 90-year historical macro cycles all echo concerning patterns for September 2025 (Iran-Iraq war, US financial strains, Livermore sustainability collapse)
Gold is the exception with bullish seasonal bias in September - the most positive month of the year for the metal
Oil remains in a structural downtrend with the multi-year support band broken - contrarian to its seasonal positive bias
Bitcoin has 66.7% probability of ending September negative - short history makes seasonal data less reliable but still cautionary
EUR/USD has particularly strong statistical signals with 80% probability of Euro decline around Sep 25
Institutional positioning (CFTC COT) shows hedging activity in equities - more PUT buying versus CALL
The overall sentiment indicator (Fear & Greed Index) at 64 suggests greed but not extreme - room for both directions but reversal risk is elevated
Multiple assets show technical weakness despite bullish primary trends - divergences on weekly RSI/MACD are common across equities and crypto
All analysis should be combined with real-time price action at turning point dates - dates are not predictions but windows of opportunity
The W.D. Gann principle applies: Time is more important than price, but price must confirm the turn
risk_rules: September is historically the most dangerous month for risk assets - reduce overall exposure and position sizes
Never trade turning point dates in isolation - always combine with technical analysis (support/resistance, chart patterns, divergences)
Tighten stops on all existing long positions, especially in S&P 500 and Bitcoin
Avoid opening new leveraged positions (2x-3x ETFs, leveraged crypto) during this month
Cross-asset confluence dates (Sep 3, 9, 15, 23, 24) carry the highest reversal risk - be extra cautious around these dates
Turning point dates can deviate by +/- 1 trading day - be prepared for this
The classic pattern is high-low-high alternation, but consecutive highs or lows are also possible - do not assume direction before price confirms
When trading against the overall trend, entries should only be made after clear reversal confirmation signals
Gradually take profits in positions showing significant unrealized gains - do not wait for a single exit point
Keep position sizes small enough to survive the worst-case scenario for each turning point
Stay connected to the Discord community for real-time updates and adjustments to the monthly outlook
None of the content constitutes investment advice - all material is for educational and informational purposes only
